title: Jo Stevens – 2021 Comments on the Government’s Technology Announcement
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jo Stevens, the Shadow Digital, Culture, Media and Sport Secretary, on 2 August 2021.
content:
The Conservatives are keeping the UK in the digital slow lane with their broken promises on the gigabit rollout, shifting their targets again and again.
